name: bga-wingspan-scraper
description: Firefox extension to scrape BGA Wingspan game replays

scripts.dist: run-s dist:clean dist:build dist:copy dist:assets dist:manifest
scripts.clean:dev: node -e "fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('build-dev', {recursive: true, force: true})"
scripts.dist:clean:dist: node -e "fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true})"
scripts.dist:clean:build: node -e "fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('build', {recursive: true, force: true})"
